document_data.name: Shi'drin Philiom
document_data.Activities: Shi'drin was a member of [[House Philiom]] in Llurth Dreir and the second-in-command of [[Molvayas]]'s group.
document_data.History: In [[1379 DR]], he questioned [[Kâras]] about Molvayas's disappearance but Kâras said he was killed by a priest of [[House Abbylan]]. Shi'drin didn't question any further, happy to become the new Eater of Filth of the House.
